featured.text: Other researchers believe it was because onions were known for their special curative properties, which would be helpful in the afterlife.

definition.zh_def: 死後的生活或存在，通常指人死後靈魂的狀態或世界。
definition.en_def: The existence or state of life after death, often referring to the soul's condition or realm following physical demise.
definition.example: Many cultures have different beliefs about the afterlife.
